content: Profound changes in labor markets – and impacting socio-psychological effects on people – will happen as artificial intelligence takes over the functions of human jobs in all industries.
translations: ita:Profondi cambiamenti nei mercati del lavoro – e gravi effetti socio-psicologici sulle persone – si verificheranno quando
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
